description:

Xi Jinping vows to take Taiwan. Japan ramps up military spending. Russia signals support for China. From massive PLA drills to nuclear expansion and oil deals, the lines are being drawn for a potential global conflict. This week’s China headlines break down why tensions are accelerating—and why World War III no longer feels hypothetical.
